Back on traveling corresponded comedian Tom Papa in a second we caught up in America are you there Tom I'm here crafts
That was a beautiful song it was fun listening to it from inside the parking garage
When I'm ready to go on behalf of live from here I'm resuming my journey across the country sharing the good stories of our fellow Americans
This week I traveled to Buffalo New York along Lake Erie were the sky was cloaked in a constant gray missed allowing for just occasional peaks of the colorful leaves
The forecast was calling for the first snow fall of the year but for the good people of buffalo that's not even cause to wear a long sleeve shirt
When you live in Buffalo complaining about the weather is like complaining about life itself I was picked up at the airport by a woman named Charlie she's been driving for twenty two years in their cabinets filled with stuffed animals they lined the
Dashboard hung from the rear view mirror and the monkey was attached to the steering wheel
These are my co pilot she said some people have Jesus I have these guys she goes by Charlie because her father was hoping she'd be a boy I really think the name made me a bit of a tomboy when I was younger
They don't say tomboy anymore now everybody is filled with gender fluids
I guess I was ahead of my time but anyway I'm all girl now and everyone still calls me Charlie
After growing up in Buffalo she went to college down in Arizona because I wanted to
Go to the hottest place I could find but it turns out I'm not built for the desert seems more like a place for lizards
People who stay there too long start to look like a sponge that was left out in the sun
She came home after school and it's been in Buffalo ever since we have a lot of moisture here and I love it I'm like a plant water me and I grow when it's not raining it's snowing and when it's not doing either we can count on them is from Niagara Falls are you here to see the falls
Have you ever lied your cab driver about seeing Niagara Falls because you didn't want her to know you planned your entire trip around eating buffalo wings [noise]
She dropped me off downtown and I went out looking for a bar if you're looking for a bar or tavern buffalo is a good place to look save a lot of them and last call it's for a em they said it staying up to open later gives the snow plows time to clear your way home [noise]
I entered what looked like one of the older bars in the city covered in lights and years who signed coasters stuck to the walls to kind of place where it's always midnight the kind of place that so tired that even the ceiling seems to be hunched
Over at the end of the bar the bartender where the big bear of a man named Chris he had a giant feared and big pause and then grab while he worked he said that he's been in this bar for Thirty years and that he's been there so
Long he doesn't even smell they're famous buffalo wings any more people come in all the time and they say they smelled them all the way down the street but I don't smell a thing who knows maybe it's me they smell

Eagerly place my order something great about eating food that makes a city famous in addition to whatever natural elements are involved in the water the air the ingredients there's also a pride and the love and it's corny as it might sound
They're involved in the water the air the ingredients there's also a pride and love and it's corny as it might sound the love the people add makes all the difference
Have you ever been away from home for so long that you started protecting your love for a plate of deep fried chicken wings I have
Chris had a big hartfield laugh his kids are grown and just him and his wife down the kids all moved away which means that his grandchildren are too far out of reach for his liking
I don't understand what everybody's after I mean sure moving to another city might get you a little more money but when you lose from being away from your family is too big of a cost
Everyone complains about their parents until they shell out twenty dollars an hour for a babysitter and then suddenly we're not so bad
He keeps busy with his bowling league he said people like to knock bowling but it's a damn good game especially when you have your own shoes he pointed their wallet bowling trophies behind them that his team won throughout the years their name is great balls of fire
But this year we're a little nervous we lost one of our guys to a heart attack and there's a young team called the kings that's been gunning for us but we refuse to lose to a team whose name isn't even a little funny it might be a different story if it was the Likud he splits
Among the trophies with the fate of newspaper article featuring a high school football team there was a picture of Chris he was the captain in the last year they won the state championship this was a different life it's all just a memory now he said just like this will be one day
Have you ever started to tear up about a bartenders glory years only to realize it was just your eyes watering from a plate of piping hot buffalo wings
And boy were they hot my lips were on fire tears were rolling down my cheeks I wasn't thinking clearly have you ever tried tax cool in front of a bunch of locals until one of them pointed out that you were sweating from your bald spot
[noise] I have
Stumbled outside to get some air and the first snowflakes were starting to fall the first snow falls like a visit from your family who you're happy to see before they hang around too long and becomes difficult
I looked up to the sky as a snowflake landed on my cheek and I brushed it off have you ever forgot that you would wings thoughts on your fingers touch dry and had to run into a bar to beg a giant bartender to throw beer in your face
[noise] I have
And that's why I'm not a local but I'll return to buffalo just as soon as the snow melts and I buy some gloves until next time this has been Tom Papa out in America [noise]
